text:
I am wearing a very appropriate shirt for
todays video. Take Chances! Words that I live
by and encourage you to do the same.

As many of you may already know, this weekend
a very young and talented soul passed away

named Cory Monteith. He is an actor best known
for his role of Finn Hudson in the hit show
Glee.

I have never been too affected by the death
of a celebrity, but Cory Monteiths death has

really affected me. I did not know him, but
I am a big fan of Glee and really appreciated

not just his talent but the person he was
with fans and media. He was humble, appreciative
and kind.

The reason why I am talking about this today
is because Cory's death has reminded me of

the importance of living a happy and fulfilled
life each and every day! While having a dream

and future goals is necessary, it is important
to enjoy the journey, and really remind yourself

to do this every day. We get to caught up,
myself included, in what's next that we forget
that NOW is the only concrete thing we have!

We must do what makes us happy right now.
There are way too many people who tell me

that they WISH they could travel like me...that
would be their dream. What are you waiting

for? Today is what you have and tomorrow may
never come. You must stop dreaming and take

control of your life. You need to take a chance,
no matter how scary it may seem. If your dream
doesn't scare you, it's not big enough.

For those of you who want to see the world
and make travel a lifestyle...DO IT! I completely

and entirely believe that ANYTHING is possible.
Right now, say out loud what your dream is.

What is the thing that makes you so happy,
excited, antsy and overwhelmed? Say what it

is out loud, and then say I AM GOING TO TURN
MY DREAM INTO REALITY. There's no turning

back. Life is way too short to say, there's
always tomorrow. One day tomorrow will not

exist for you. Surround yourself with people
who motivate and inspire you. The people that

are going to help you along the way of pursuing
your dreams. For your adventurous spirits

out there, this what I am here for. I want
to inspire and inform you...and of course

entertain BECAUSE THAT IS WHAT I LOVE, to
go out and make your dreams come true RIGHT
NOW!

The journey is when you feel the most alive!
Enjoy your incredible journey working towards

your dream...enjoy every second of it. Enjoy
the fact that you are working towards something

you love so much and be proud of that. If
it becomes a struggle and unenjoyable, then

what is the point? You will lose your spark
and time will pass you so fast.

Try to stop and really take in the moment
your in as often as possible. It's a difficult

things to always do, but the more you practice,
the more automatic it becomes. If you are

looking a t flower, really look at it, take
in it's smell, colour, beauty. When you eat

something, taste all of the flavours, enjoy
the textures. Take in and really appreciate

every experience while it's happening. Smile
often and tell other and yourself how much
you love them regularly.

I wrote an article on my blog that talks further
about pursuing your dream and enjoying the
journey. You can read it here.

I will end this video with a quote from Howard
Thurman, influential African American author,

philosopher, theologian, educator and civil
rights leader.

"Don't ask what the world needs; ask what
makes you come alive and then do it. Because

what the world needs is people who have come
alive."

If this video inspired you in any way, please
pass it on to your friends and family. It's

good to be reminded about everything I spoke
about. I love you all. Take chances, live

each day like its your last, love, laugh,
dance and enjoy every moment.
Rest in Peace Cory Monteith.
